Package org.platanios.learn.classification

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Classifier<T extends Vector,S>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTrainableLogisticRegression
    This class implements a binary logistic regression model that is trained using the stochastic gradient descent algorithm.
    AbstractTrainableLogisticRegression.AbstractBuilder<T extends AbstractTrainableLogisticRegression.AbstractBuilder<T>>
    This abstract class needs to be extended by the builder of its parent binary logistic regression class.
    AbstractTrainableLogisticRegression.Builder
    The builder class for this class.
    BinaryLogisticRegressionTest  
    DataInstance<T extends Vector,S>  
    DataInstances  
    DataPreprocessing  
    LogisticRegressionAdaGrad
    This class implements a binary logistic regression model that is trained using the adaptive gradient algorithm.
    LogisticRegressionAdaGrad.AbstractBuilder<T extends LogisticRegressionAdaGrad.AbstractBuilder<T>>
    This abstract class needs to be extended by the builder of its parent binary logistic regression class.
    LogisticRegressionAdaGrad.Builder
    The builder class for this class.
    LogisticRegressionPrediction
    This abstract class provides some functionality that is common to all binary logistic regression classes.
    LogisticRegressionPrediction.AbstractBuilder<T extends LogisticRegressionPrediction.AbstractBuilder<T>>
    This abstract class needs to be extended by the builders of all binary logistic regression classes.
    LogisticRegressionPrediction.Builder
    The builder class for this abstract class.
    LogisticRegressionSGD
    This class implements a binary logistic regression model that is trained using the stochastic gradient descent algorithm.
    LogisticRegressionSGD.AbstractBuilder<T extends LogisticRegressionSGD.AbstractBuilder<T>>
    This abstract class needs to be extended by the builder of its parent binary logistic regression class.
    LogisticRegressionSGD.Builder
    The builder class for this class.
